review: Very fun to play and easy to learn. Its a balanced and competitive game that will doesn't take much of your time....unless of course you continue playing for years and years (like I have been) and see how much time you've spent on it!

I don't usually recommend video games but I just finished playing Life is strange and I do believe it has one of the best stories in a video game I've seen. Sure there are some minor issues in gameplay but the soundtrack, voice acting and character arcs are the most powerful aspects of this game . It reaffirms my preference for video games over TV/cinema as a story telling media . So if you do play video games, I think you should at least try the first episode! 10/10. PS - don't binge play all the episodes, give your poor self a break. You'll thank me for it.
